channel.title: waterquality on Jessica Jagdeo ESM 244 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in waterquality on Jessica Jagdeo ESM 244 Blog

item.title: Assessment of Santa Ynez River Water Quality
item.description: Santa Ynez Water Quality Historical Data Data only goes back to 1998 Turbidity units: NTU TSS and TDS units: mg/L santa_ynez_water_quality_raw <- read_csv("RAW_santa_ynez_water_quality.csv") santa_ynez_water_quality <- santa_ynez_water_quality_raw %>% select(OrganizationFormalName, ActivityStartDate, MonitoringLocationIdentifier, CharacteristicName, ResultSampleFractionText, ResultMeasureValue, "ResultMeasure/MeasureUnitCode") %>% # Selecting only relevant columns filter(CharacteristicName == "Total dissolved solids"| CharacteristicName == "Turbidity" | CharacteristicName == "Total suspended solids") %>% separate(ActivityStartDate, sep = "-", into = c("year", "month", "day")) %>% group_by(year, month, CharacteristicName) %>% summarize(value = sum(ResultMeasureValue)) santa_ynez_water_quality$date <- as.
